title: My Fiancé Was Cheating on Me, so I Left a Letter and Disappeared - Novel Updates
tags: Arranged Marriage   Childhood Friends   Childhood Love   European Ambience   Fallen Nobility   Female Protagonist   Forced into a Relationship   Forced Marriage   Hiding True Identity   Nobles   Royalty
author: Sakurai Mikoto   櫻井みこと
description:
In the garden, Countess Marian comes across her fiancé Nick, who is whispering his love to another woman.

She sees them both drunk with tragic love and fears being turned into villainess.

Marian decides to vanish with the assistance of her friends.>
